long_description: The Yakima Universal MightyMount offers a versatile way to attach Yakima accessories to your vehicle's crossbars. This one product fits an incredible range of vehicle crossbars, whether they are small, large, wide or even angled. It is also compatible with the most popular Yakima accessories such as upright bike mounts, boat mounts and ski mounts. Dynaflex(TM) padded bails provide protection and grip. Accessory Lock Housing and SKS cores add security (sold separately). Includes set of four. No additional tools required for use. Fits boat accessories: Mako Saddle, Hully Roller, Land Shark and Multi-Mount. Fits ski mounts: LiftTicket 6, LiftTicket 4, Big PowderHound SE and PowderHound SE. Fits bike accessories: Highroller, Wheel Fork and Raptor. Fits luggage accessory: Basket Case.
short_description: The Yakima Universal MightyMount offers a versatile way to attach Yakima accessories to your vehicle's crossbars.
